text: Lucie Samuel (29 June 1912 â€“ 14 March 2007), born Lucie Bernard, and better known as Lucie Aubrac, was a French history teacher. She was a member of the French Resistance during World War II. Aubrac died in Issy-les-Moulineaux, near Paris, on 14 March 2007, aged 94. She was survived by her three children and her husband, Raymond Aubrac. ==Other websites== * Guardian obituary, 16 March 2007 * Category:1912 births Category:2007 deaths Category:French teachers Category:French people of World War II
title: Lucie Aubrac
